education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Communications with Minor in Business Administration

responsibilities: Lead digital marketing strategy for 12+ clients across B2B and B2C industries, resulting in 45% average growth in online revenue
Manage $1.2M annual digital advertising budget while maintaining ROI above 300%
Oversee team of 6 marketing specialists, content creators, and PPC managers
Implemented automated marketing dashboard reducing reporting time by 65%
Developed content marketing strategy that increased organic traffic by 78% YOY
Redesigned email marketing campaigns improving open rates from 18% to 32%
Created and executed comprehensive digital marketing plans for SaaS clients
Managed social media accounts growing collective following from 25K to 150K
Led rebranding initiative that improved brand recognition by 60% according to market research
Optimized landing pages increasing conversion rate by 35%
Collaborated with sales team to develop lead nurturing workflows raising qualified lead generation by 42%
Conducted A/B testing across campaigns to identify highest performing content
Assisted in coordinating marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels
Managed company social media accounts and created engaging content calendar
Helped organize 6 industry events with average attendance of 300+ professionals
Supported design team in creating marketing collateral for products and services
Monitored campaign performance and prepared monthly analytics reports

projects.name: SUSTAINABLE FASHION BRAND LAUNCH
projects.description: Developed complete digital marketing strategy for eco-friendly fashion startup. Created brand identity, messaging, and positioning in competitive market. Implemented social media strategy resulting in 25K followers pre-launch. Designed influencer marketing program with 85% engagement rate.

projects.name: SAAS PRODUCT MARKETING CAMPAIGN
projects.description: Led marketing campaign for enterprise software launch generating $1.2M in first-quarter sales. Developed content marketing strategy including whitepaper, case studies, and blog series. Created and optimized PPC campaigns with 4.5% CTR (industry average: 1.91%). Implemented marketing automation workflows for lead nurturing.
